DOC.brief_summary: To study the efficacy and tolerability of gemcitabine/platinum chemotherapy in non small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Gemcitabine/Platinum Containing Regimens as Preoperative Chemotherapy for Patients With Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically of cytologically confirmed non small cell lung cancer No prior chemotherapy or radiation No prior malignancy Pregnant or breastfeeding Serious concomitant systemic disorder
